snippet: Hewlett-Packard has received inquiries from would-be buyers for its Autonomy and Electronic Data Systems units, but the technology company isn’t interested in selling at the moment.
abstract: Hewlett-Packard has received inquiries from would-be buyers for its Autonomy and Electronic Data Systems units, but the technology company isn’t interested in selling at the moment.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: H.P. Said to Have Suitors for Two Units
headline.print_headline: Two Units Of Hewlett Reportedly Draw Suitors
